trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The anxious adventurer is fumbling with letters bearing the Ul'dahn seal.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the letters.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the anxious adventurer.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_001<tab>Praise the Twelve, another adventurer! I've been wandering around this godsdamned city for hours!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_002<tab>I was hired for some <var 1A 02 /var>simple<var 1A 01 /var> express deliveries in Ul'dah before realizing the destination was...bloody Radz-at-Han. Simple, my arse. After coming all this way, I still don't know where I'm supposed to go!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_003<tab>I'm at my wit's end and running out of time! These letters have a tight deadline and if I don't deliver them, I won't merely lose my job─I'll lose my head!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_004<tab>Could I ask you to take these two missives to the High Crucible and House Balyk, respectively? I can manage the third one on my own. Return and meet me here when the job's done, and I'll see you're duly compensated for your efforts.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_ISU_000_005<tab>Welcome to the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya, friend! How might I be of service?
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_ISU_000_006<tab>What's that? You've a letter addressed to us? Why, this is from Master Jalzahn! Last I heard, he was doing field research in Eorzea. I do hope all's well...

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_ISU_000_007<tab>...Why, I can scarce believe it! Word of our plight reached him from across the sea, and he's arranged for a shipment of vital supplies to be shipped from Rowena's House of Splendors!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_ISU_000_008<tab>That he would be thinking of us in these trying times, even as he doubtless is facing his own fair share of hardships. Truly, he is a great man. But forgive me...I must make arrangements to have the shipment picked up in Yedlihmad at once!
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_ISU_000_009<tab>Master Jalzahn is truly our savior, and a paragon for alchemists everywhere. I cannot thank you enough for delivering his message to us.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_010<tab>What business have you with the esteemed House Balyk?
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_011<tab>An urgent letter? Let me see... Why, it's from dear Ardashir! At least we now know he is not out begging on the streets!
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_012<tab>Ardashir is the youngest son of our House. Father was upset he forsook blood and nation to tinker with soot-stained alembics, and thus he never wrote.

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_013<tab>He never even told us how we might contact him, so we've naturally been worried sick. Now he writes...that he's found a new trading associate for Father? Some merchant named Rowena. He says she can help us in our plight.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_014<tab>What a peculiar topic for him to write about. He was always so recalcitrant about the family business. Perhaps he is homesick and trying to make amends?

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_015<tab>Nevertheless, we are delighted to hear from him. It is true that our country is in a precarious position. But I am elated to know my brother is safe and happy in Eorzea.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_BARIKSISTER_000_016<tab>Thank you for delivering this letter. I will share it with my sisters at once.
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_017<tab><huff> <huff> ...Just delivered the last one!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_018<tab>I've heard horrible rumors of Rowena's punishments if you fail your task. Like scrubbing grime from warehouse tiles with a paintbrush! In plate! You really saved my skin, friend!

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_019<tab>I wanted to become an adventurer so badly, and she tempted me with this beautiful set of armor. Said I could put it on credit and work off my debt.

TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_020<tab>Before I knew it, I found myself playing errand girl to the House of Splendors! Oh, I don't fault her for it─an adventurer needs armor, after all. But my word if she isn't a shrewd one!
TEXT_AKTKZF016_04271_INTROUBLEADVENTURER_000_021<tab>Anyroad, thank you for your help. Here, I'll give you half of the House's commission for the job. Take it, you've earned it!
